channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Some Disappointing News About The ‘3 Body Problem’ Season 2 Release Date On Netflix
item.description: 3 Body Problem seasons 2 and 3 are coming, but a new update about their release dates mean this will be one of the longest gaps in streaming.

item.title: Here’s How The iPhone 17 Air Might Look Next To iPhone 16 Pro Max
item.description: The iPhone 17 Air looks almost half as thick as the iPhone 16 Pro Max in the latest images shared by reputed leaker Majin Bu.

item.title: ‘Destiny 2: Year Of Prophecy’ $275 Bundle Leaks During Puzzle Frenzy
item.description: A Year of Prophecy bundle for Destiny 2, was listed on the store for a short amount of time, priced at $275. What is it?

item.title: Key Takeaways From Intel Foundry Direct Connect 2025
item.description: All of the EDA providers voiced their impressions of Intel 18A, which were universally positive.

item.title: Malware Steals 1.7 Billion Passwords — Publishes Them To Dark Web
item.description: The malware threat to your passwords has gone into overdrive — here’s what you need to know.

item.title: Uncomfortable ideas
item.description: The ideas aren’t uncomfortable, we are. You don’t have to like the weather to acknowledge that it’s raining.
